Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>The village was attacked by pirates
recently. Isn't that awful?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Tired_01>Thankfully, someone chased them off,
so it should be safe now. And I hear
rebuilding efforts are underway.
StableHostelPicture: So cute! I want to pet it!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> Need something, sir?<sp:0:4:0>I'm in the middle of tending to the horses,
but I can multitask, <sp:5:0:0>hehe!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>We have lots of happy horses roaming
free around Highland Stable, so if you
need one, you're in the right place.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>Then you can ride it north or south or
wherever you feel like going!<sp:0:4:0>I know some <clr:0000>scenic spots <clr:ffff>for you and
your horse to visit, if you're interested!
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>I've got plenty more scenic spots
to recommend! <sp:5:0:0>Just say the word!
LargeHorse: Will that fit in the stable?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> Need something, sir?<sp:0:4:0>I'm in the middle of tending to the horses,
but I can multitask, <sp:5:0:0>hehe!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm happy to suggest some <clr:0000>scenic
spots <clr:ffff>for you and your horse to visit,
if you're interested!
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> Was there something else you
needed, sir?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Have I mentioned my suggestions for
scenic spots to see with your horse?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> Need something at this late
hour, sir?<sp:0:4:0>I can tell you about the area if that's
what you're after.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>We have lots of happy horses roaming
free around Highland Stable, so if you
need one, you're in the right place.<sp:0:4:0>Then you can take it north or south or
wherever you feel like going!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>I can recommend some <clr:0000>scenic spots<clr:ffff>
to visit, if you'd like!
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> Need something, sir?<sp:0:4:0>I'm in the middle of tending to the horses,
but I can multitask, <sp:5:0:0>hehe!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>We have lots of happy horses roaming
free around Highland Stable, so if you
need one, you're in the right place.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>Then you can ride it north or south or
wherever you feel like going!<sp:0:4:0>I know some <clr:0000>scenic spots <clr:ffff>for you and
your horse to visit, if you're interested!
Talk_0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>And that<sp:5:0:0> concludes my list of scenic
spots! I hope you enjoyed it!<sp:0:4:0><snd:Chat_01>If you want me to repeat all that, just ask.
I'm happy to run through it again!
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> I'm not used to being asked for
help this late.<sp:0:4:0>Is there something you want to know
about the stable?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Or perhaps you'd like to hear about <clr:0000>scenic
spots <clr:ffff>to visit with your horse!
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> Need something, sir?<sp:0:4:0>I'm on my way to tend to the horses,
but I can tend to you first, <sp:5:0:0>hehe!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm happy to suggest some <clr:0000>scenic
spots <clr:ffff>for you and your horse to visit,
if you're interested!
Talk_0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah!<sp:5:1:0> You're interested in the <clr:0000>Lake of the
Horse God<clr:ffff>?

That's where the customers I met the
other day were headed!

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_00>The <clr:0000>god of horses <clr:ffff>was said to live by
the lake, but I haven't heard of anyone
seeing him lately.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_00>Still, those two were hoping to find him—<sp:5:0:0>
and that <clr:0000>new breed of horse <clr:ffff>they call the
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> Need something, sir?<sp:0:4:0>I can tell you about the area if that's
what you're after.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>We have lots of happy horses roaming
free around Highland Stable, so if you
need one, you're in the right place.<sp:0:4:0>Then you can take it north or south or
wherever you feel like going!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>I can recommend some <clr:0000>scenic spots<clr:ffff>
to visit, if you'd like!
Talk_0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>You got it! <sp:5:0:0>Come find me whenever you
want a recommendation or three.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>If you don't check out my scenic spots,
I'll set the horses on you! <sp:5:0:0>Kidding!
Talk_0112:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>The <clr:0000>Lake of the Horse God<clr:ffff> is south
of here on the compass.

But to get there, you'll want to tack <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>
around the mountains and valleys.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Those two customers, and now you...<sp:5:1:0>
That place is popular! Maybe I should
add it to my list of scenic spots!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yes?<sp:5:0:0> How can I help you?<sp:0:4:0>Is there something you want to know
about the stable?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Or perhaps you'd like to hear about
<clr:0000>scenic spots <clr:ffff>to visit with your horse!
Talk_0113:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>If you want to hear more of my
recommendations, please come talk
to me anytime!
Talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sad_00>Rainy today.<sp:0:4:0>I might add more carrots to the feed so
the horses don't catch colds.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway...
Talk_0114:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Wait, whoa...<sp:5:1:0> Your horse! Is that the
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:1:0>It's terrifyingly
huge, but also undeniably elegant!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I can't wait to tell everyone I saw the
fabled steed in person!
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>All right!<sp:5:0:0> Ready? I saved my favorite
scenic spot for last!<sp:0:4:0>Though it's kind of big to be called a
"spot"...<sp:5:1:0> It's the southern coastline!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Picture this—<sp:5:0:0>you and your horse riding
from Martha's Landing to Komo Shoreline
and then Puffer Beach.
You hear the waves lapping against
the beach...<sp:0:4:0>feel the cool sea breeze cutting through
your clothes...<sp:0:4:0>while your horse's hooves pound faster
and faster against the ground!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Ahhh!<sp:5:0:0> There's nothing better!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>On a horse, you'll be able to outrun any
monsters that spot you too.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Except...<sp:5:0:0>last time I rode to Puffer Beach,
there was a swarm of flying monsters
waiting for me.
They came screeching out of a cave in
the ceiling of this rocky area. Really
caught me by surprise!
I'm not a flying-thing-ologist, but I guess
they were nesting there?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, those things can move as fast
as horses, so watch out for them.
Talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I had a couple customers recently who
weren't interested in any of my
recommendations. Can you believe that?
They said they were headed south toward
the <clr:0000>Lake of the Horse God <clr:ffff>and didn't
have time for detours.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I believe they wanted to find the <clr:0000>giant
white stallion <clr:ffff>or the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Anyway... <sp:5:1:0>I appreciate you taking an
interest in my scenic spots!<sp:0:4:0>Come talk to me again anytime!
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>OK! <sp:5:0:0>My third scenic spot is Lake Hylia in
the northwest!<sp:0:4:0>Your horse shouldn't go IN the lake, of
course. But you two can take a thrilling
ride across the <clr:0000>Bridge of Hylia<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>One problem though...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>I heard an unsettling rumor.<sp:5:0:0> Sounds like
there's a big monster camping out on
the bridge.<sp:0:4:0>If you're as scared of monsters as I am,
you might want to keep your distance.
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>OK! <sp:5:0:0>My third scenic spot is Lake Hylia in
the northwest!<sp:0:4:0>Your horse shouldn't go IN the lake, of
course. But you two can take a thrilling
ride across the <clr:0000>Bridge of Hylia<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>They say a monster was living on the
bridge for a time...<sp:0:4:0>But some brave monster slayer sent the
beast to an early grave!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Who that person is, or where they're from,
I don't know...<sp:5:0:0>but if I could, I'd give them
a hearty thank-you!
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>All right!<sp:5:0:0> Here's a location that's been a
mystery long as anyone can remember.
A good spot for true adventure!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>To reach it, first ride north until you enter
a thickly wooded forest.<sp:0:4:0>Then travel east until you cross Floria
River—and there, go immediately north
into a rain forest.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>You will find yourself what folks have
long called...<sp:5:0:0>the <clr:0000>Zonai Ruins<clr:ffff>. Very old
ruins—VERY old!<sp:0:4:0>I can't imagine a better place for steeping
yourself in nature's beauty and ancient
history at the same time.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In the air above the Zonai Ruins is a
jet-black thundercloud that's been
there since the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>You can see it from here, in fact.<sp:5:0:0> And... <sp:5:1:0>
Am I seeing things, or is there something
inside the cloud?
That's a great scenic spot to visit as well.
Or it would be.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>But there's no horse that can get you up
there. The best you can do is gaze at it
from below.
Talk_0201: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>All right, then!<sp:5:0:0> Have fun out there!
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Great!<sp:5:0:0> Let's get scenic!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>My first suggestion has to be the
stable nearby.<sp:0:4:0>It's called <clr:0000>Lakeside Stable<clr:ffff>. You'll find it if
you take the road toward the east, at the
edge of Lake Floria.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>From there, my next suggestion's nearby.
Go farther east, turn south at the ocean,
and you'll reach a resort town.
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>, it's called. The perfect
place for weary travelers looking to relax!
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait... What am I thinking?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>We got word the other day that pirates
attacked Lurelin Village.<sp:0:4:0>Since then, I haven't heard a peep about
the town's fate.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>So, what I said about Lurelin Village being
a good place to relax? Scratch that.
Talk_0201_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>And that<sp:5:0:0> concludes my guide to all
the scenic spots!

I hope you enjoyed it!
